title: srIdhara vaikuNTAdipa
sahitya:
shrIdhara vaikuNThAdhipa dEvA mAdhava mAmava dEvAdi dEvA

anupallavi

 bhEda rahita budhA rAdhi tAngiyuga

caraNam 1

 pakSi vAhana ghana kAkSa vidArA rakSita dAna vardhyakSa kumArA
 
caraNam 2

 vAridhi garva nivAra harE raghuvIra suri janAdhArA parAtpara
 
caraNam 3

 bhAsamAna bAkAsanadhara shUra dUSaNa kara hara asahAya shUra
 
caraNam 4

 bhAncita vrSabhadhvaja vara cApa ranjita mithilApura vara bhUpA
 
caraNam 5

 rAmacandrapuradhAra shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata citta vihArA
